vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to exercise the first of three one-year renewal options to the service contract with Linebarger Goggan Blair & Sampson, LLP for collection of delinquent fines and fees for violations of City ordinances, traffic, and state laws, excluding parking violations - Estimated Annual Gross Revenue: $25,150,000.00 - General Fund ($14,425,491.00), Technology Fund ($614,417.00), Security Fee Fund ($455,813.00), Juvenile Case Manager Fund ($366,650.00), Dallas Tomorrow Fund ($563,380.00), Special Contract Collection ($7,625,402.00), Dallas Animal Welfare Fund ($609,478.00), and Municipal Jury Fund ($489,369.00) (see Fiscal Information)
